# API Documentation

## Authentication
- Supabase JWT authentication with Row Level Security.

## Endpoints (Supabase auto-generated)
- `GET /rest/v1/members`
- `GET /rest/v1/staff`
- `GET /rest/v1/checkins`
- `GET /rest/v1/checkin_tokens`
- `GET /rest/v1/membership_plans`
- `GET /rest/v1/classes`
- `GET /rest/v1/class_schedules`
- `GET /rest/v1/class_bookings`
- `GET /rest/v1/payments`
- `GET /rest/v1/invoices`

## Edge Functions
- `generate-checkin-token`
- `validate-checkin-token`
